Package camzup.core

Class Face3

java.lang.Object
camzup.core.Face3
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.lang.Comparable<Face3>, java.lang.Iterable<Edge3>
public class Face3
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.lang.Iterable<Edge3>, java.lang.Comparable<Face3>
Organizes components of a 3D mesh into a list of vertices that form a face. This is not used by a mesh internally; it is created upon retrieval from a mesh.

  • Nested Class Summary

    Nested Classes 
    Modifier and Type Class Description
    static class  Face3.Edge3Iterator
    An iterator, which allows a face's edges to be accessed in an enhanced for loop.
    static class  Face3.Vert3Iterator
    An iterator, which allows a face's vertices to be accessed in an enhanced for loop.

  • Field Summary

    Fields 
    Modifier and Type Field Description
    Vert3[] vertices
    The array of vertices in the face's edge loop.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors 
    Constructor Description
    Face3()
    The default constructor.
    Face3​(Edge3... edges)
    Creates a face from an array of edges.
    Face3​(Vert3... vertices)
    Creates a face from an array of vertices.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    static Vec3 centerMean​(Face3 face, Vec3 target)
    Finds the center of a face by averaging all the coordinates in its list of vertices.
    int compareTo​(Face3 face)
    Compares this face to another by hash code.
    Face3.Edge3Iterator edgeIterator()
    Returns an edge iterator for this face, which allows its vertices to be accessed in an enhanced for-loop.

    Tests this face for equivalence with another object.

    Finds a point on the face's perimeter given a step in the range [0.0, 1.0] .

    int length()
    Returns the number of vertices in this face.
    static Vec3 normal​(Face3 face, Vec3 target)
    Finds the normal of a face by averaging all the normals in its list of vertices, then normalizing the average.
    static Quaternion orientation​(Face3 face, Handedness handedness, Quaternion target)
    Returns the orientation of the vertex as a quaternion based on the face's normal.
    static Transform3 orientation​(Face3 face, Handedness handedness, Transform3 target)
    Returns the orientation of the vertex as a transform based on the face's normal.
    static Ray3 orientation​(Face3 face, Ray3 target)
    Returns the orientation of the vertex as a ray based on the face's normal.

    Calculates the perimeter of a face by summing the Euclidean distance between vertices.

    Face3 scale​(float scale)
    Scales all coordinates in the face by a scalar.
    Face3 scale​(Vec3 scale)
    Scales all coordinates in the face by a scalar.

    Beware, non-uniform scaling requires that normals be recalculated for correct shading.
    Face3 scaleGlobal​(float scale)
    Scales all coordinates in the face by a scalar; uses global coordinates, i.e., doesn't consider the face's position.
    Face3 scaleGlobal​(Vec3 scale)
    Scales all coordinates in the face by a scalar; uses global coordinates, i.e., doesn't consider the face's position.
    Face3 scaleLocal​(float scale, Vec3 center)
    Scales all coordinates in the face by a scalar; subtracts the face's center from each vertex, scales, then adds the center.
    Face3 scaleLocal​(Vec3 scale, Vec3 center)
    Scales all coordinates in the face by a scalar; subtracts the face's center from each vertex, scales, then adds the center.

    Beware, non-uniform scaling requires that normals be recalculated for correct shading.

    Sets this face's vertices to refer to those in an array of edges.

    Translates all coordinates in a face by a vector; uses global coordinates, i.e., doesn't consider the face's orientation.

      public Face3 rotateLocal​(float cosa, float sina, Vec3 axis, Vec3 center)

    • set

      public Face3 set​(Edge3... edges)
      Sets this face's vertices to refer to those in an array of edges. Assumes that each edge's origin matches the preceding edge's destination, and so only the origins need to be registered.
      Parameters:
      edges - the edges
      Returns:
      this face

    • translateGlobal

      public Face3 translateGlobal​(Vec3 v)
      Translates all coordinates in a face by a vector; uses global coordinates, i.e., doesn't consider the face's orientation.
      Parameters:
      v - the vector
      Returns:
      this face
      See Also:
      Vec3.add(Vec3, Vec3, Vec3)

    • translateLocal

      public Face3 translateLocal​(Vec3 v, Handedness handedness)
      Translates the face in local space. This is done by (1) finding the orientation of the face; (2) multiplying the input vector by the orientation; (3) subtracting the face's center point from the face's vertices; (4) adding the local vector; (5) then adding the center point.
      Parameters:
      v - the vector
      handedness - the handedness
      Returns:
      the face

    • vertIterator

      public Face3.Vert3Iterator vertIterator()
      Returns an vertex iterator for this face, which allows its vertices to be accessed in an enhanced for-loop.
      Returns:
      the iterator

      Parameters:
      face - the face
      target - the output vector
      Returns:
      the center

      Vec3.add(Vec3, Vec3, Vec3), Vec3.div(Vec3, Vec3, Vec3)

      public static Vec3[] sharedCoords​(Face3 a, Face3 b)

      Returns:
